summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West Harrison Street, from Queen Anne Avenue to Elliott Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by replanking the same with a plank roadway sixteen (16) feet in width, in accordance with Resolution No. 2025 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
